name: GLOSET LLC
description: Operator of a digital e-commerce platform intended to provide second-hand clothes. The company's platform includes formal wear, party wear, sportswear, maternity clothes, shoes, and accessories, enabling customers to choose various fashion accessories at an affordable price.
one_liner: Operator of a digital e-commerce platform intended to provide second-hand clothes. The company's platform includes formal wear, party wear, sportswear, maternity clothes, shoes, and accessories, enabling customers to choose various fashion accessories at an affordable price.
